ComicInfo.Summary:
As if Zombie Tramp and DollFace weren't enough, now Black Betty is in on the action too! Everything is leading up to the landmark 50th issue blowout!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including the featured artist variants!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|----------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Marco Maccagni | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 2 | | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | David Reynolds | 3 | | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | David Reynolds | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Claudio Avella | 5 | | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Claudio Avella | 6 |
Note: Issue #48 in a series.
ComicInfo.Title: Climax Royale Part Three
